remarks: An associative (closed internal binary) operation for a set is associative.  (Contributed by FL, 2-Nov-2009.)  (Revised by AV, 20-Jan-2020.)
statement:
assintopass $p |- ( .o. e. ( assIntOp ` M ) -> A. x e. M A. y e. M A. z e. M ( ( x .o. y ) .o. z ) = ( x .o. ( y .o. z ) ) ) $.
$d .o. x y z $.
$d M x y z $.
